#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{

    long long n,k,m,t,i;
    scanf("%lld",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        i=1;
        scanf("%lld %lld %lld",&n,&k,&m);
        if(k==1)
        {
            printf("%lld\n",n);
            continue;
        }
    while((n%k)==0)
    {
        n=n/k;
        i++;
    }
    m=m-i+1;
    if((m%2)==0)
    printf("%lld\n",n);
    else
    {
    printf("%lld\n",n*k);
    }
    }
    return 0;
}
